text: Cargeghe (Calzèghe, Cagliègga) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 724 people lived there. Its area is 12.05 km². It is 333 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Cargeghe
